dc:description: GitHub Actions, the new GitHub workflow engine finally reaches a real maturity. Whether it is for CI/CD pipelines, manage your GitHub projects or automate your connected coffee maker, GitHub Actions make it easy to achieve everything. Mixing theory, exercises and practice on these actual use cases, this book addresses all the concepts around this product. Whether creating rich workflows, making multi-environment cloud deployment, or even develop your own actions in accordance with good performance and security practices, this book aims to be your companion to take full advantage of the GitHub Actions
